channel.title: Weapon Speeds
channel.description:
Strange.....
Ive noticed this with ALL weapons.... say when you first log in and attack with a great axe, all weapons you use until you log out will be the great axe's speed. same with any other weapon. any way to prevent this?[br][size=1]Posted at: August 01, 2006, 12:07:36 PM[/size][hr]Actualy it seems all wepons are as slow as Dharoks axe even tho there weapon speeds are set in client.java, like i have whip set to 7 but it hits as slow as dharoks[br][size=1]Posted at: August 01, 2006, 12:15:52 PM[/size][hr]Why does no one ever help you on these forums omfg[br][size=1]Posted at: August 01, 2006, 12:53:58 PM[/size][hr]..?[br][size=1]Posted at: August 01, 2006, 03:51:04 PM[/size][hr]???Cmon help me ffs[br][size=1]Posted at: August 01, 2006, 06:21:15 PM[/size][hr]FFS Ive waiting long enough why does no one help[br][size=1]Posted at: August 01, 2006, 10:55:47 PM[/size][hr]Every thing is correct and i didnt touch them and 1 minute the work the nex they dont[br][size=1]Posted at: August 02, 2006, 02:03:08 AM[/size][hr]..
I dont knoww hats causing this its just that none of the weapon speeds work, they worked before I updated and I NEVER ONCE touched them

item.title: Weapon Speeds
item.dc:creator: @krawks12 krawks12
item.description:
@krawks12 wrote:

for attack animation example…

if (wearID == 4151) { // Abyssal Whip
playerSEW = 1660;
playerSER = 1661;
playerSE = 1832;
playerSEA = 1658;
}

playerSE = GetStandAnim(wearID);
playerSEW = GetWalkAnim(wearID);
playerSER = GetRunAnim(wearID);
playerSEA = 0x326; these are what each player then letter stands for but youll have to find the one you like for d skimmy and if using testscape search for:

if (wearID == 4151) { //Whip

ass for speed thing i have same problem whehn i set speeds for my other weapons they almost all went to same speed

Read full topic

Yeah, i wonder why my whip was so slow >.> Now i know.[br][size=1]Posted at: September 05, 2006, 04:01:25 PM[/size][hr]Oh, and half the weapons don t work? Like the dragon scimmey and hally, just punches like nothing is there ? Can anyone fix this.
